# plot scan result for conditional_m2.Novelty_residuals_RankNormal_datarelease_07302918
```{r plot scan result for conditional_m2.Novelty_residuals_RankNormal_datarelease_07302918, fig.height=14, fig.width=14, eval=TRUE}
#   This script performs plotting on qtl conditional mapping for DO mice m2, Novelty_residuals_RankNormal_datarelease_07302918
library(qtl2)
library(ggplot2)
load("data/Jackson_Lab_Bubier_MURGIGV01/gm_DO2437_qc.RData")
pheno <- read.csv("data/pheno/Novelty_residuals_RankNormal_datarelease_07302918.csv", header = TRUE)

print("m2")
load("output/condi.m2.qtl.out.RData")

#genome-wide results
pdf(file = paste0("output/conditional_m2.Novelty_residuals_RankNormal_datarelease_07302918", "_genomescan.pdf"), width = 14)
for(i in names(condi.m2.qtl.out)){
  par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 1.1, 1.1))
  ymx <- maxlod(condi.m2.qtl.out[[i]]) # overall maximum LOD score
  plot(condi.m2.qtl.out[[i]], gm_DO2437_qc$gmap, lodcolumn=1,
       col="slateblue", ylim=c(0, ymx*1.02),
       main=i)
}
dev.off()

par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 1.1, 1.1))
ymx <- maxlod(condi.m2.qtl.out[[i]]) # overall maximum LOD score
plot(condi.m2.qtl.out[[i]], gm_DO2437_qc$gmap, lodcolumn=1,
     col="slateblue", ylim=c(0, ymx*1.02),
     main=i)
```
